Subject: 5 Minutes that can significantly improve your Company's Supply Chain challenges / performance
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Valued Customer,

 

Integrated Logistics, the neutral 4PL arm of Kuehne+Nagel for over 20 years, has a global workforce of 850+ employees across 8 control towers, ensuring a seamless end-to-end supply chain for our 4PL customers. 

Our success is built on the global 4PL platform ‘ControLOG,’ now available as a self-service solution called eControl.

 

I am reaching out to you today to introduce eControl, our web-based Visibility & Collaboration platform, enabling you to manage shipments across all your Logistics Service Providers. It leverages the proven 4PL expertise of Kuehne+Nagel Integrated Logistics and will allow you to

chunks.text:
I am reaching out to you today to introduce eControl, our web-based Visibility & Collaboration platform, enabling you to manage shipments across all your Logistics Service Providers. It leverages the proven 4PL expertise of Kuehne+Nagel Integrated Logistics and will allow you to 

*	Reduce the time your teams spend working on Excel spreadsheets and in Outlook
*	Have a consolidated view on status of all your shipment
*	Proactively manage your supply chain performance

 

eControl combines an advanced supply chain management platform with selected services required to ensure your supply chain data is reliable. It includes all key features that you expect from a cutting-edge supply chain platform:

*	Shipment Visibility 
*	Predictive Milestones
*	Risk Management 
*	Collaboration Workflows
*	Document Management
*	Performance Analytics 

 

To enable your teams to efficiently work with reliable data, a team of KN data quality experts monitors completeness, correctness, and timeliness of your operational data and steps-in if data quality is not at the required level.

 

eControl is developed to meet core supply chain requirements based on an attractive commercial proposal:

*	4-8 weeks implementation lead time
*	Competitive implementation and transactional fees
*	Scalable service scope to suit your needs

 

The attached flyer summarizes the key features of our new platform. Reach out to me today either by email or by booking a slot below - we will show you the platform and the value it will bring to your logistics management during a short live demo!

 

Hope to see you soon!

chunks.text:
Kühne + Nagel (AG & Co.) KG
Rechtsform: Kommanditgesellschaft, Bremen HRA 21928, USt-IdNr.: DE 812773878.
Geschäftsleitung Kühne + Nagel (AG & Co.) KG: Tobias Jerschke (Vors.), Simon Bitter, Martin Brinkmann, Lars-Olof Grün, Matthias Knicky, Martin Schäfer, Lars Wedel.
Persönlich haftende Gesellschafterin: Kühne & Nagel A.G., Rechtsform: Aktiengesellschaft nach luxemburgischem Recht, HR-Nr.: B 18745, Geschäftsführendes Verwaltungsratsmitglied: Karl Gernandt.

Wir arbeiten ausschließlich auf Grundlage der Allgemeinen Deutschen Spediteurbedingungen 2017 (ADSp 2017). Hinweis: Die ADSp 2017 weichen in Ziffer 23 hinsichtlich des Haftungshöchstbetrages für Güterschäden (§ 431 HGB) vom Gesetz ab, indem sie die Haftung bei multimodalen Transporten unter Einschluss einer Seebeförderung und bei unbekanntem Schadenort auf 2 SZR/kg und im Übrigen die Regelhaftung von 8,33 SZR/kg zusätzlich auf 1,25 Millionen Euro je Schadenfall sowie 2,5 Millionen Euro je Schadenereignis, mindestens aber 2 SZR/kg, beschränken. Die ADSp sind auf unserer Webseite als Download erhältlich. Auf Anfrage senden wir Ihnen diese auch gerne zu.
